turtleClasses

Class Turtle

  • java.lang.Object
    • turtleClasses.SimpleTurtle
      • turtleClasses.Turtle

  • public class Turtle
extends SimpleTurtle
    Class that represents a turtle which is similar to a Logo turtle. This class inherts from SimpleTurtle and is for students to add methods to. Copyright Georgia Institute of Technology 2004

    • Constructor Summary

      • Turtle

        public Turtle(ModelDisplay modelDisplay,
      int delay)
        Constructor that takes the model display and pauses delay milliseconds between actions
        Parameters:
        modelDisplay - the thing that displays the model
        delay - the number of milliseconds delay between turtle actions (turns, moves) [1000 = 1 sec]
